TextView.android:text: BD Clean is a non-profit voluntary organization. BD Clean is not a sponsored or grant-based organization. BD Clean runs from the willful financial support of its members. To accelerate our activities towards a clean and green Bangladesh, we need more financial support. So we have decided to nominate a few individuals who will be recognized as an Honorable Member of BD Clean in return for a yearly fixed contribution.

EditText.android:hint: Why are you interested in becoming an honorable member of BD Clean?

TextView.android:text: Do you currently serve as an honorable member of any organization?
Please provide a brief description of at least three (03) of your social welfare and philanthropic activities below:
Any citizen or immigrant of Bangladesh and any organization is eligible to become an honorable member of BD Clean.
A one-time payment of five lakh (05) taka for one year is required to become an honorable member.
Your membership must be renewed annually upon payment of Tk 5 lakh; failure to do so will result in the cancellation of your honorable membership at the end of the term.

Any individual engaged in anti-state activities will be deemed unsuitable for honorable membership. Furthermore, if an honorable member becomes involved in anti-state activities or is convicted by the court after obtaining membership, their membership will be terminated.
